(1,): As a system administrator, I want to configure logging for the application, so that I can monitor system activities and troubleshoot issues As a test manager, I want to schedule user testing sessions, so that I can organize evaluation activities As a tester, I want to record issues found during testing, so that developers can address them As a manager, I want to generate a test summary report, so that I can track testing progress and issues As a validator, I want to apply validation rules for fields like DUNS and PPoPCode, so that I can ensure data compliance As a UI designer, I want to update and approve page designs, so that the application's interface stays consistent and user-friendly As a system monitor, I want to track application metrics, so that I can monitor performance and usage As a developer, I want to reset environment permissions, so that I can ensure secure default access As a user, I want to receive clear error messages for common issues, so that I can quickly identify and resolve problems
(2,): As a user, I want to create a new FABS submission with an initial status, so that I can start the publication process As a user, I want to update the publish status of a FABS submission, so that I can track its progress through the workflow As a validator, I want to validate a FABS submission for required fields, so that I can ensure data quality before publication As a publisher, I want to publish a validated FABS submission, so that the data becomes available to stakeholders As a database administrator, I want to add and retrieve FABS submissions from the database, so that I can manage submission records efficiently As a data processor, I want to generate a D file from FABS and FPDS data, so that I can prepare data for further processing As a data engineer, I want to load historical FABS and FPDS data, so that I can populate the system with legacy records
(0,): As a user, I want to check if the GTAS is locked, so that I know if submissions can be modified As a system monitor, I want to check if FPDS data is up-to-date, so that I can ensure data synchronization
